name: Warp Out
description:
Warp Out offers an intense dive in a unique shoot ‘em up !
You’ve just stolen an experimental spaceship. An army is now chasing you. One solution: Destroy every enemy on your path!

Built for VR

No compromise for Warp Out. Right from the start, our game was developed for virtual reality. The whole gameplay has been built around it to deliver the best possible experience.

Four worlds to discover

Face your enemies across the galaxy. But you'll have no time to wander : from the desert to the arctic, your opponents won’t give you a break!

Various enemies and bosses

Each world has its own enemies who will try to stop you. But that’s not it! Be prepared to face the most skilled adversaries : the bosses, who will test how good you are at end of each world.

A Worldwide Leaderboard

Challenge your friends, and confront other players through a worldwide ranking!

Free, continuous updates

Regular updates are planned following the launch of the game. On the program : new maps, new enemies and new interactions. Please feel free to give us your feedback on our discord channel. We are a team of enthusiasts who wants to create the best shoot ‘em up possible in VR. We are looking forward to continuing this adventure with our community of players.
